items.name: var flow: NEFilterFlow?
items.desc: The flow on which the associated action was taken.

items.desc: The action taken on the reported flow.

items.name: enum NEFilterAction
items.desc: The actions a data provider can take on a filter flow.

items.desc: The number of outbound bytes sent on the flow.
